column4: i was wrestling with knoppix for awhile - always fearing malware would cause me to lose the time invested setting up/tweaking it. Ubuntu is painless. (er, okay i haven't set up IPTables. - lol)
Firestarter is installed? (crosses fingers) preconfigured?
hm - even a n00b like me could do that much - lol
n00b is not really a term that is used around here a lot
read www.ubuntu.com/wiki/RestrictedFormats
don't install a sarge pakcage on debian
if the cpu supports it
multiheaded systems?
dvdrip is uglier, but faster
thoggen is nice, but very alpha right now
I am running breezy, but I haven't shut my machine down in 3 days due to the X bug

we need a source deb and alien doesn't do that
there are some intro developer docs coming soon
open syn and hit restore defaults
in settings-->repos-->authentication
